Who?

Creative full-stack web developer and web designer, specialising in{" "} frontend development{" "} - with a background in fine arts, aiming for an exciting job opportunity to continue growing and blossoming into a professional developer.

{/* 'What?' */}

What?

Broad knowledge of frontend development, particularly in{" "} ReactJS and{" "} SASS/Scss{" "} with a keen interest in UI/UX - creating dynamic, sophisticated and scalable websites and web apps.

Well-versed in programming basics and vanilla{" "} JavaScript,{" "} along with backend development skills - building servers and databases with Node,{" "} Express and{" "} MongoDB.

{/* 'Where?' */}

Where?

Australian born, Berlin based - recently graduated from an intensive one year web development course in{" "} MERN stack at the Digital Career Institute, Berlin. {/* after completing a 1 year intensive training program at Digital Career Institute in Berlin. */}
